name: Andrélon Classic conditioner verrassend volume
composition: INGREDIËNTEN: Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Bambusa Vulgaris Shoot (Bamboe) Extract, Behentrimonium Chloride, Collagen Amino Acids (Collageen), Parfum, Dimethicone, Dipropylene Glycol, Lactic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Amodimethicone, Magnesium Nitrate, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool.
